mapper.select: select o.id,o.serviceId,o.type,s.name,s.parentC,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.id = #{orderId} and o.serviceId = s.id
select * from cs_order where userId = #{userId}

select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{id} and o.serviceId = s.id and o.status in (1,2) order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id
AND o.status in (1,2)
AND o.status =2
and o.status in (1,2)
order by o.create_date desc limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
select a.ip from cs_order_ip a where a.orderId=#{orderId}
select * from cs_order where id=( select orderId from cs_order_ip where id=#{order_ip_Id})
mapper.update:
update cs_order
message=#{message},
status=#{status},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status = 2
SELECT c.id FROM cs_order c WHERE c.id=#{orderId} AND c.type =#{type} AND c.userId=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM cs_order c WHERE c.id=#{orderId}
select * from cs_order where 1=1 and id like concat('%',concat(#{id}, '%')) and userId = #{userId} order by userId
select api.num from cs_order_api api,cs_order order1 where api.id=#{orderId} and order1.payFlag=1 and order1.id=api.id

select t1.type,count(t1.type) as userNums from ( select type,userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=1 group by type,userId ) as t1 union select t2.type,count(t2.type) as userNums from ( select type,userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=2 group by type,userId having userId not in( select userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=1 group by userId ) ) as t2

SELECT IFNULL(sum(o.price),0) price,s.name servName FROM cs_order o,cs_service s WHERE s.id=o.serviceId AND o.payFlag = '1' and date_format(o.create_date,'%Y-%m')=#{createDate} GROUP BY s.name order by price
select t1.type,t2.`name`,count(t1.id) as countNums from cs_order as t1 inner join cs_service as t2 on t1.serviceId=t2.id and t1.delFlag=0 and t1.payFlag=1 group by t1.type,t1.serviceId

SELECT * FROM cs_order o WHERE
o.payFlag = '1' and o.delFlag <> 1
